content.text: were disappointed to hear of the glacial pace of academic writing and publication. Foolishly perhaps, in our goodbye to the whole class, we entered into a discussion about what the book should be called. We offered the usual mouthful of academic keywords, only to be firmly overridden by Megan, who confidently called out that it should be called “The Class,” of course. So it is.

document.title: The Class: Living and Learning in the Digital Age
document.author: Sonia Livingstone and Julian Sefton-Green
